TopicTitle: You will go to space today

Articles.Content:
Previously: A Home on Laythe

Edited June 20, 2013 by earthlight
I think I may have to shed a manly tear now. This is just beautiful!

Funnily enough, I was thinking that there should be more tracking stations all over Kerbin. Just one (or two if you know where to look ) wouldn't cut it, plus it adds to the scenery if more were to be added. Anyway, great work!

That's awesome work. And Darth, if the female Kerbals aren't on the rockets, where else do you think they'd be? Also, I just noticed the doodling on the 'orbital information' chart. It seems exactly like what Kerbal Mission Controllers would do.

I've got to draw a proper view of the SCSG Space program's Mission Control.
Wow, that's perfectly amazing. What'd you use to make this (besides magic)?

Wow, that's perfectly amazing. What'd you use to make this (besides magic)?

Thanks! With few exceptions, I make everything with photoshop, reference images, and lots of caffeine.

Fantastic!

I like the one with a mustache!

Great work. I really need to tackle something like this sooner or later...

And yeah, we do need a few more tracking stations out there, it would make RemoteTech a little less vexing, as fun as setting up relays in Kerbosynchronous Orbit can be.
This is really good, great work, it would be awesome to have something like that in game.

it would be awesome to have something like that in game.

I agree, though this was meant to be 'historical' and I imagine that a real in-game mission control would be slightly more technological. Then again, if there were an option for a 1950's-esque space center I might use that instead.
can u make a picture of liftoff? considering how good this picture is, a pic of a rocket launch would be beautiful.
